attributes.action: NO CONFIDENCE in Boris Johnson PM to lead UK > General Election NOW!
attributes.background: 37 lies, gaffes and scandals that make Boris Johnson unfit to be Prime Minister. https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/politics/37-lies-gaffes-scandals-make-18558695

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264215
